titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the 400th anniversary of Quebec City in Quebec, Canada, since its founding in 1608 by French explorer Samuel de Champlain.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
2/12/2008--Introduced.
Recognizes Quebec City's 400th anniversary. Honors the contributions to friendship made by the people of Quebec City to North America.
